p: According to the timeline of LBM closure actions, each wave can be divided into an early stage and a late stage. The rough cut points for the 2 waves were 15 April 2013 and 23 January 2014 separately. Human cases spread to neighboring provinces late in the first two waves ( S2 Fig). In the first wave, farmers occupied 21% of the total human cases and in the second wave, the percentage of farmer cases rose to 31%. This increase is statistically significant (Chi-square test, P = 0.03).
